name: Early Bird Shanghai Street Breakfast Tour
description: Savor the taste of Shanghai’s famous ‘xiaolongbao’ (soup dumplings), taste wanton, breakfast pancakes and more on this 3-hour, small-group walking tour with a knowledgeable local guide. Begin your day with a stroll past water calligraphers and tai chi masters in Local Park, before meandering to street stalls and a wet market to experience Chinese cuisine freshly prepared in front of you. Be sure to come hungry on this child-friendly tour, limited to six ensure a personalized experience.
